title: John Garamendi - Wikipedia
snippet: John Raymond Garamendi (/ˌɡærəˈmɛndi/ GARR-ə-MEN-dee; born January 24, 1945) is an American businessman, politician and member of the Democratic Party who has represented areas of Northern California between San Francisco and Sacramento, including the cities of Fairfield and Vacaville ...

title: John Garamendi - Ballotpedia
snippet: John Garamendi (Democratic Party) is a member of the U.S. House, representing California's 8th Congressional District. He assumed office on January 3, 2023. His current term ends on January 3, 2027.
